S04n284:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma kalantakanivāse veṇuvane mahatā bhikṣusaṅaghena sārdhaṃ dviśatapacāśadbhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ |
S04n284:4: atha bhagavānanekaśatasahasraparivāraparivṛtaḥ purato'valokya dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
S04n284:5: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyajanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma ||
S04n284:6: 2. tadā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo vimvisāraḥ mahātā rājavibhavena mahatā ca rājabalena rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena veṇuvanaṃ yena ca bhagavān tenopasaṅakramīt |
S04n284:7: upasaṅakramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte atiṣṭhat |
S04n284:8: ekānte sthitvā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavantametadavocat |
S04n284:9: kathaṃ bhagavan kṛtaṃ karma saṃcayaṃ pratirudhya ciraniruddhaṃ maraṇakāla upasthitaṃ manaso'bhimukhībhavati |
S04n284:12: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret |
S04n284:14: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī ||
S04n284:16: 5. bhagavānāha! tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet |
S04n284:19: atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate |
S04n284:23: 7. bhagavānāha! evameva mahārāja balo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet |
S04n284:26: saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti |
S04n284:28: niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
S04n284:35: tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso'bhimukhībhavati |
S04n284:45: tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate |
S04n284:47: tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati |
S04n284:63: prathamavijñānasya mahārāja aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya nirantarā cittasantatiḥ pravartate |
S04n284:69: 9.yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo'bhilapyate |
S04n284:70: nāsau saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā ||
S04n284:71: 10. nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmnā nāma na vidyate |
S04n284:74: sāpyatra kalpanā śūnyā yayā śūnyā vikalpitāḥ ||
S04n284:79: 14. na cakṣūḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca |
S04n284:80: etattu paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate ||
S04n284:82: magadhadeśarājaḥ śreṇyaḥ bimbisāraḥ te bodhisattvāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko muditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan ||
